backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, session creation, access control checks, and attendance recording with maps and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence values.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries for all frontend source files describing their roles in routing, UI, hooks, and feature logic.
frontend/DELIVERY.md: Documentation explaining PWA delivery, Android installation steps, and how to wrap the app into an APK via TWA tools.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base theme settings.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with metadata, PWA manifest, root mount point, and service worker registration.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, icons, theme colors, and display behavior.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing basic caching, offline fallback, and cache version cleanup.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup with splash logic, auth/profile‑aware redirects, and route definitions for all pages.
Route guard that checks admin status and redirects unauthorized users to the access-denied page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication guard that blocks access until Internet Identity is loaded and redirects unauthenticated users to login.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Empty file placeholder for a user profile setup dialog component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper providing page container and persistent bottom navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Renders a bottom navigation bar with dynamic items based on admin status and highlights the active route.
frontend/src/components/scan/CheckInResu: Displays a check‑in result with status-based icon, title, message, and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/scan/ManualEntry: Provides a form for manually entering a QR code and submitting it.
frontend/src/components/scan/ScannerPane: Implements camera-based QR scanning with controls for start, stop, switching cameras, and handling scan results.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and updating the caller’s user profile and role, including admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication state and login/logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for sessions and attendance, including fetching, creating sessions, and check‑ins.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, wraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, and mounts it.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Shows an access denied message for non-teachers with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAttendance: Admin page to select a session and view its attendance list with date and time details.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSessionsPa: Admin UI for listing sessions, creating new ones, and validating start/end times before submitting via createSession.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard showing user greeting, logout, navigation cards, and admin-only session management links.
frontend/src/pages/DeliveryNotesPage.tsx: Displays installation notes and APK build instructions including Bubblewrap commands with copy support.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with a sign-in button and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/RegistrationPage.tsx: Registration form to save user profile and role, then redirect to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/ScanCheckInPage.tsx: QR scan and manual entry check‑in page that validates sessions and displays result states.
frontend/src/pages/SplashPage.tsx: Splash screen with branding, illustration, and loading animation.
frontend/src/pages/user/AttendanceHistor: Displays a user's attendance history, resolving session names and formatting timestamps, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements, features, architecture notes, and current build state for the attendance system.
